TenantSecurityPolicySelectedTenant.name: TenantSecurityPolicySelectedTenant
TenantSecurityPolicySelectedTenant.description: Stores the list of tenants selected for a Security Center policy. For more information, see Define and Deploy Security Policies. This object is available to Security Center subscribers in API version 54.0 and later.

Name.description: The name of the policy for the selected tenant.

PolicyIdentifier.description: The ID of the security policy.
